name: deleted
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
delete
B1 to remove or draw a line through something, especially a written word or words: They insisted that all expletives be deleted from the article. Here is a list of possible answers. Please delete (= draw a line through them) as appropriate.
More examplesFewer examplesAll names have been deleted from the report.I deleted the file by accident.All swear words were deleted from the text.I deleted the entire paragraph.They have deleted a clause in the contract which says the company can make people redundant for economic reasons.
